Name: Ancient Guardians: The Dragon
About the game: Game whose protagonist is a dragon that guards the mystical forest from invading humans. The game is a roguelite where you can improve your attributes and skills with cards you receive at the end of each wave of invaders. You can walk and fly around the map while casting your spells at enemies and dodging projectiles. There are many cards that can be combined with their abilities according to your strategy. Your goal is to get as far as possible, while the enemies get stronger and more skillful. In the main menu, you can unlock and permanently upgrade your spells and equip them in empty slots according to your combat strategy. It is possible to unlock some skins in the game. After unlocking and improving all the spells, you can test various combinations of different spells and cards, with many build possibilities. There are also some challenges you can complete to earn extra gold.
